result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Robert P Pirk Jr

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Robert P Pirk in court with attorney Christopher James Simonds.  Erika Frank Motsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Carolyn Kingsley.
Plea - Ct.1 - 15CM2164 - G.
BTC: Ct.1 - 15CM2164 - GUILTY.    Ct.2 - DRI.    15CM2222 - DRI.
Deft is Ordered to provide a DNA specimen;
$450 inclusive of costs, apply bond from case 15CM2222, pp $50/mo beg 1-1-16, ftp 3 days RCJ for contempt.

Defendant Robert P Pirk in court with attorney Christopher James Simonds.  Erika Frank Motsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Carolyn Kingsley.
Matter is scheduled on Def's motion to modify bond.
Def is moving to remove the SCRAM unit on case 15CM2222 for reasons stated on the record.
State does not object.
BTC: Modify bond in case 15CM2222 to remove the SCRAM unit, deft must be tested at least 3 times per week.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions: ***10-30-15 BOND CONDITIONS MODIFIED TO REMOVE THE SCRAM UNIT. DEFT MUST BE TESTED AT LEAST 3 TIMES PER WEEK.***  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any  alcohol.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.  The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Defendant is ordered to have SCRAM unit installed and monitored by Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) - 524 S. Main Street, 3rd floor (262-632-1780.  $208 advanced fee for installment of SCRAM must be paid prior to release from jail.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Pre-trial conference at 10-15-2015 03:15 pm.
Status conference at 11-17-2015 08:30 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any  alcohol.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.  The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Defendant is ordered to have SCRAM unit installed and monitored by Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) - 524 S. Main Street, 3rd floor (262-632-1780.  $208 advanced fee for installment of SCRAM must be paid prior to release from jail.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Robert P Pirk in court with attorney Carolyn Hillery Delery.  Defendant Robert P Pirk in custody.  Rebecca L Sommers appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Nancy Szeklinski.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 15, 2015 at 03:15 pm.  Status conference scheduled for November 17, 2015 at 08:30 am.
